title: Update light theme to beige background with black text

requirements.text: Update the app light theme to use a beige background with black (or near-black) foreground text by adjusting the light-mode CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` (the `:root` block). Ensure the main surfaces (`--background`, `--card`, `--popover`, `--sidebar`) are beige-toned and that text tokens (`--foreground`, `--card-foreground`, `--popover-foreground`, `--sidebar-foreground`) resolve to black/near-black with accessible contrast.
acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the page background and primary surfaces render in a beige tone (not pure white).
In light mode, default text renders as black or near-black across pages (login, dashboard, client dashboard) with good readability.
No UI areas remain unintentionally pure white due to theme tokens (except where explicitly intended, e.g., images).

requirements.text: Align light-mode interactive/accent tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` with the beige/black theme so buttons, borders, inputs, rings, and muted/secondary surfaces remain consistent and readable (e.g., `--primary`, `--primary-foreground`, `--secondary`, `--muted`, `--accent`, `--border`, `--input`, `--ring`). Keep the existing dark theme tokens unchanged unless they cause readability issues after the light-theme update.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary buttons and their text have clear contrast in light mode (no low-contrast beige-on-beige or black-on-black combinations).
Borders/inputs are visible but subtle on beige backgrounds in light mode.
Dark mode appearance remains functionally unchanged (no regressions in readability or broken colors).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead if needed).
Do not edit any paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (including `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
nonGoals: Adding new application features beyond the color/theme update.
Changing authentication flow or backend logic.
